description: This allows you to pattern a component around a helix
objectsTooltip: Select the object or objects to pattern
objectsPrompt: Select the object or objects to pattern
axisTooltip: Select the axis for the helix
axisPrompt: Select the axis for the helix
turnsTooltip: The number of turns (complete revolutions) in the helix
countTooltip: The number of patterned objects for one turn
depthPerTurnToolTip: The depth of the helix for one turn, also known as the pitch
